EmailTemplate.name: Submission outside our regulations
EmailTemplate.subject: Submission outside our regulations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Graduate Education.
As you are no longer enrolled in the research degree, you will need to the visit the return to study website for details and eligibility criteria for re-admission.
Thanks and best wishes _______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
